Refund Policy

30 Day Money Back Guarantee

If you do not find value in the deals on the Premium list, send us an email at scott@scottscheapflights.com within 30 days of your sign up date and we will refund your money.

If You Registered for a Free Trial

If you signed up for a free trial and want to cancel, be sure to do so before the trial ends to avoid getting charged.

Each household is allowed one free trial or one refund.
